Sequence Information.Peptide Name: SWDPm2 (P. monodon Single WAP domain (SWD) protein 2; natural AMPs; Crustaceans, arthropods, invertebrates, animals)
Sequence Information.Source: hemocytes, the black tiger shrimp,Penaeus monodon

Literature Information.Literature: APD analysis reveals that the sequence of this peptide most resembles (38.6% similarity)Omwaprin. The recombinant protein showed activity against Gram+ bacteria but not Gram- bacteria. Active against A. viridans, M. luteus (MIC 1.56-6.25 uM), S. aureus and B. megaterium (MIC 12.5-50 uM).
Literature Information.Author: Amparyup P, Donpudsa S, Tassanakajon A. 2008
Literature Information.Title: Shrimp single WAP domain (SWD)-containing protein exhibits proteinase inhibitory and antimicrobial activities
